InstNodeÂ¶

struct asmjit::InstNode
#include <compiler.h>

Instruction node.

Public Functions

InstNode(BaseCompiler * compiler, uint32_t code, uint32_t options, Operand * opList, uint32_t opCount)

Create a new InstNode instance.

~InstNode()

Destroy the InstNode instance.

uint32_t getCode()

Get instruction code, see kInstCode.

void setCode(uint32_t code)

Set instruction code to code.

Please do not modify instruction code if you are not know what you are doing. Incorrect instruction code or operands can raise assertion() at runtime.

bool isTaken()

Whether the instruction is an unconditional jump or whether the instruction is a conditional jump which is likely to be taken.

uint32_t getOptions()

Get emit options.

void setOptions(uint32_t options)

Set emit options.

void addOptions(uint32_t options)

Add emit options.

void andOptions(uint32_t options)

Mask emit options.

void delOptions(uint32_t options)

Clear emit options.

Operand * getOpList()

Get operands list.

const Operand * getOpList()

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

uint32_t getOpCount()

Get operands count.

bool hasMemOp()

Get whether the instruction contains a memory operand.

void setMemOpIndex(uint32_t index)

Set memory operand index (in opList), 0xFF means that instruction doesn’t have a memory operand.

void resetMemOpIndex()

Reset memory operand index, setting it to 0xFF.

BaseMem * getMemOp()

Get memory operand.

Note
Can only be called if the instruction has such operand, see hasMemOp().

template < typename T >
T * getMemOp()

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

void _updateMemOp()

Public Members

uint16_t _code

Instruction code, see kInstCode.

uint8_t _options

Instruction options, see kInstOptions.

uint8_t _memOpIndex

Operand * _opList

Operands list.

Private Functions

InstNode(const InstNode & other)

InstNode & operator=(const InstNode & other)
